sentence.Network_en: Intentionality is a core issue of contemporary western philosophy.
sentence.Network_cn: 意向性问题是当代西方哲学关注的核心论题.

sentence.Network_en: In its fullest sense, intentionality is both a pointing at something and a possessing of it.
sentence.Network_cn: 在其最广泛的意义上说, 意向性是同时指向某物和拥有某物(意向性是指向某物并拥有之).

sentence.Network_en: Intentionality is one of the seven textual standards suggested by Beaugrande & Dressler ( 1981 ).
sentence.Network_cn: 意图性是语篇语言学家 博格兰 和德雷斯勒 ( 1981 ) 提出的七项语篇标准之一.

auth_sentence.content: People will say that I left my wife and I suppose, as a factual matter, I did, but where was the intentionality?
